```{r}
require(plm)
 data(outdata4)
test <- plm(Roa)
Roa_Lm <- lm(Roa ~ SustainabilityPayLink + SustainableThemedCommitment + AuditScore + CarbonProductivity + WaterProductivity + WasteProductivity + Leverage + NetMargin + FirmSize + Beta, data= outdata4)
  
    cooksdRoa <- cooks.distance(Roa_Lm)
    influentialRoa <- as.numeric(names(cooksdRoa)[(cooksdRoa > 4*mean(cooksdRoa, na.rm=T))])
    NewFiles <- outdata4[-c(influentialRoa),]
    
test1 <- plm(Roa ~ SustainabilityPayLink + SustainableThemedCommitment + AuditScore + CarbonProductivity + WaterProductivity + WasteProductivity + Leverage + NetMargin + FirmSize + Beta , index = c("Companies", "Year"), model = "random", data = NewFiles)  
summary(test1)
```
